PlayContent.Title: Background to Play
PlayContent.Heading: Summary Built on Akka and backed by TypeSafe. Used by a number of prominent websites. Open source software with Apache license!
What is Akka? A concurrency/distribution framework for Java/Scala. Abstracts and simplifies handling of low-level OS details like threads, locks, and IO operations. Created by TypeSafe.
Who is TypeSafe? Company was founded by creator of Scala to support the language. Focused on making apps more "reactive". Supports the open source community!
Reactive apps embody four ideals: Event-driven. Scalable. Resilient. Responsive.
Used By: TheGuardian, a popular daily newspaper in the UK. LinkedIn, a popular professional-oriented social network.
